headline: Cognizant and Merchants Fleet Set New Standard for Fleet Management Efficiency
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) today announced a strategic partnership with Merchants Fleet, a market leader in fleet management and fleet leasing solutions, to transform operations and drive efficiency through advanced technology and artificial intelligence. The collaboration continues Merchants Fleet's strategic initiative to modernize business processes across sales, fleet operations, and customer service, while enabling Merchants Fleet's agility towards changing business environments and evolving
